brand_info.name: MindFit速
brand_info.positioning: Leading the mental fitness movement, offering a proactive, accessible, and clinically-backed approach to building mental fitness.
brand_info.vision: To empower individuals with the tools they need to thrive in a complicated modern life and create a more mentally fit culture ready to handle our complex world.
brand_info.mission: To solve our mental health crisis with a new, proactive approach to building mental fitness using accessible, clinically-backed exercises.
brand_info.origin_story: Founded by Nicholas Singh, who, after experiencing severe anxiety at age 15, sought alternatives to sedatives. He adapted therapy exercises into a digital program called 'MindFit' with the help of scientific and clinical advisors. A 2023 pilot study validated the program's effectiveness.

brand_values.brand_promise: To provide clinically-backed tools and exercises that empower individuals to build mental fitness, manage stress, enhance emotional regulation, and improve overall well-being, leading to tangible, lasting results.
differentiators: Clinically-backed exercises adapted from therapy settings
Focus on proactive mental fitness rather than just reactive treatment
Accessible digital platform for daily practice
Quantifiable results through pilot studies and progress tracking
non_negotiables: User accessibility and ease of use
Focus on positive mental health outcomes
Ethical communication regarding mental health claims

demographics.age_range: Adults (18+), with a broad appeal for 'Everyday Heroes' at any stage of life.
demographics.income_level: Mid to upper-mid, seeking value in self-improvement and well-being tools

psychographics.lifestyle: Health-conscious, self-improving, proactive in personal development, seeking practical solutions for stress and mental well-being, digitally native or comfortable with app-based solutions.
psychographics.behavior: Engages in self-care routines, uses digital tools for personal growth, seeks evidence-based solutions, values consistency in practice, open to new approaches for mental health.

tone_of_voice.communication_style: Clear, direct, educational, empathetic, solution-oriented, using analogies to make complex concepts accessible.
tone_of_voice.language_register: Informal yet professional, avoiding overly clinical jargon but maintaining credibility.
avoid: Language that stigmatizes mental health challenges
tone_of_voice.emotional_temperature: Warm, reassuring, optimistic, yet grounded in reality and practical application.
tone_dos: Highlight scientific backing and real-world results
Employ metaphors that resonate with physical fitness
tone_donts: Focus solely on problems without offering solutions
Use language that implies weakness or failure

logo.primary_logo: A stylized 'M' or brain-like icon, often integrated with the brand name 'MindFit速'. Clean, modern, and possibly incorporating subtle gradients or a sense of flow.
logo.usage_rules: Maintain clear space, ensure legibility across all sizes, use on approved backgrounds only.
logo.lockup_behavior: Logo mark and logotype are typically used together, with the registered trademark symbol速 clearly visible. Variations for small applications or social media may use the icon alone.
logo.safe_area: Minimum clear space equivalent to 'x' height of the logotype around all sides.

secondary_colors: Subtle Yellows/Oranges (for accents, energy, calls to action)
color_system.color_usage_rules: Primary colors dominate for brand recognition and conveying core values. Secondary colors are used for highlights, data visualization, and to guide user attention. Avoid overly bright or jarring combinations.

typography.primary_font: Modern sans-serif (e.g., a clean, legible font like Montserrat, Lato, or similar)
typography.secondary_font: A complementary sans-serif or a slightly more humanist sans-serif for body text, ensuring readability.

spacing.letter_spacing: Tight to normal for headlines, normal for body text.
spacing.line_height: Generous for readability, especially in body copy and app interface.

hierarchy: Large, bold headlines for impact and key messages.
Clear subheadings to break up content.
Legible body text for detailed information and instructions.
Smaller, lighter text for captions and legal disclaimers.

layout_principles.grid_system: Clean, modular grid system for consistent alignment and organization of content, especially within the app interface and data presentation.
layout_principles.white_space_ratio: High, emphasizing clarity, focus, and a sense of calm. Ample white space around elements to prevent visual clutter.
layout_principles.image_vs_text_balance: Balanced, with images and graphics supporting textual information. App screenshots and data visualizations are prominent alongside concise text.
layout_principles.cta_placement: Prominent and easily identifiable, often centered or at the end of key sections, using contrasting colors.
layout_principles.alignment: Left-aligned for most text, with some central alignment for headlines or key calls to action.

style.camera_feel: Clean, modern, slightly warm, with a focus on natural light and genuine expressions. Not overly staged or artificial.
style.pose_guidelines: Natural, relaxed, engaged in thoughtful activities (e.g., meditating, working, exercising with a focused expression), or simply smiling genuinely. Avoid overly dramatic or distressed poses.
style.casting_attitude: Confident, serene, thoughtful, engaged, and approachable. Reflects a sense of inner strength and well-being.

technical.lighting: Soft, natural, and even lighting. Avoid harsh shadows or overexposure. Emphasize a bright, optimistic feel.
technical.contrast: Medium to high, ensuring clarity and vibrancy without being overly dramatic. Good separation between subjects and backgrounds.
technical.grain: Minimal to none, maintaining a clean and polished digital aesthetic.
technical.depth_of_field: Shallow to medium, to keep focus on the subject while providing a soft, pleasing background blur.
technical.color_grading: Natural and slightly warm, enhancing skin tones and creating an inviting atmosphere. Consistent color palette across all visuals.

preferred_locations: Modern, clean indoor spaces (e.g., home, office, quiet studio)
Natural outdoor settings (e.g., parks, calm landscapes) suggesting tranquility and balance
contexts: Individuals engaging with the app on various devices
People in moments of calm or focus (e.g., meditating, deep work)
Individuals overcoming daily challenges with a sense of composure
Diverse groups interacting positively, suggesting improved relationships

model_casting.age_range: Broad, from young adults to middle-aged individuals, reflecting the 'Everyday Heroes' concept.
model_casting.diversity: High, representing various ethnicities, body types, and backgrounds to ensure broad relatability.
model_casting.attitude: Authentic, positive, confident, and serene. Conveying a sense of inner peace and capability.

product_presentation.hero_visibility: The app interface and its features are clearly visible and central when the product is shown. Screenshots are high-fidelity.
product_presentation.styling_approach: Clean, minimalist, and functional. Focus on the user experience and the benefits derived from using the app. Contextual use of the app in daily life scenarios.

motion_rules.pacing: Calm and steady, with smooth transitions. Reflects the journey of mental growth and mindfulness. Occasional moments of dynamic energy to convey progress.
motion_rules.transitions: Seamless, soft fades, subtle wipes, or gentle zooms that maintain a sense of flow and professionalism. Avoid abrupt cuts or flashy effects.

visual_dos: Show diverse individuals in natural, positive settings.
Feature clear, high-quality app screenshots and UI elements.
Utilize infographics to convey data and results effectively.
Maintain a clean, uncluttered aesthetic with ample white space.
Use consistent brand colors and typography across all visuals.
visual_donts: Use overly dramatic or distressed imagery.
Feature stock photos that look generic or inauthentic.
Clutter layouts with too many elements.
Use inconsistent color palettes or typography.
copy_dos: Emphasize empowerment, growth, and practical skills.
Highlight scientific backing and pilot study results.
Use clear, empathetic, and encouraging language.
Frame mental fitness as a proactive, lifelong journey.
Include testimonials that speak to real-world benefits.
copy_donts: Make medical claims or promise cures.
Use jargon that alienates the general audience.
Focus on fear or negative consequences without offering solutions.
Sound judgmental or dismissive of mental health struggles.

must_remain: Brand name and core logo mark
can_evolve: Specific visual styles and trends (e.g., illustration styles)
test_zone: New interactive content formats (e.g., AR filters, gamification)
Partnerships with influencers or public figures
Exploration of new digital platforms for engagement
Variations in tagline for specific campaigns

digital.tone_adjustment: Consistent with core brand tone, but adapted for platform-specific nuances (e.g., more concise for social media, more detailed for website).

content_ratio.campaign_vs_product: 60% campaign-driven content (benefits, testimonials, educational) / 40% product-focused content (app features, how-to guides).
content_ratio.motion_vs_static: 50% motion (short videos, animated infographics, app demos) / 50% static (images, text-based posts, infographics).

platform_behavior.Instagram: Visually appealing, short, engaging videos and static posts. Focus on inspirational quotes, quick tips, user testimonials, and app highlights. Use stories for interactive elements (polls, Q&A).
platform_behavior.Website: Comprehensive information, detailed explanations of methodology, scientific backing, user journey, FAQs, and clear calls to action for app download/test. High-quality visuals and intuitive navigation.
platform_behavior.Newsletter: Educational content, deeper dives into mental fitness topics, progress updates, exclusive tips, community stories, and soft calls to action for continued engagement with the app.

print.paper: High-quality, matte finish for professional and trustworthy feel. Recycled options where possible to align with conscious values.
print.cover_rules: Clean, minimalist design with prominent logo and key message. Use of primary brand colors and a single, impactful image or graphic. Focus on clarity and immediate recognition.

logo_misuse_examples: Stretching or distorting the logo proportions.
Using the logo on busy or unapproved backgrounds.
Altering the logo's colors or adding unauthorized effects.
Removing the 速 symbol when used with the brand name.
Placing the logo too close to other graphic elements without sufficient clear space.
